content:
In this thread I will collect my PRs developing some real algebra, beginning with the algebraic theory of ring orderings.

The material can be found in An introduction to real algebra by T.Y. Lam.

This is my first time PRing new maths to Mathlib (rather than just technical extensions of existing maths), so if someone who also knows the material could take a look that would be great!

#27282 - define ring orderings
Left some reviews :slight_smile:

Have had to go back and refactor.
Now at #32852 - generalise support from Subsemiring to AddSubmonoid
